amendment.description: Amendment strikes the proviso allowing $50 million for the Afghanistan security forces fund to be redirected to the Afghanistan infrastructure fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the proviso extending funds for certain Afghanistan Infrastructure Fund projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 199 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 199 (Roll no. 341).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Walberg.
